text:
-3-
Looking back, you’ll see that, at least according to my interpretation, this is
a well balanced issue - in fact, that's one reason I used it for this analysis -
because it is one of the best balanced we’ve had recently. So - well done, gal.
Anyway, that’s it, and it will at least give us some thoughts for a common ground of
understanding as we consider these matters, and as we try to increase the number of
scholarly articles we carry.
Regards,
Harold E. Hill
Vice President
HEH/mlm
cc: Walter Emery
William Harley
